dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.wf.wspec.WorkSpecificationRole
dataStructure.description:
This is an abstract base class that defines a WorkSpecification in terms of a set of roles which are then used to characterize the invariant functionality of the Work. For example, a specification of cable layout work can have the role of network build, or the role of a service fulfillment task.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: WorkSpecificationRole

child.name: workSpecRole
child.description:
Name of the role that this work specification can play, or name of the sub-type of this specification

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: workSpecRole

child.name: workRole
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association SpecifiesWorkRoles

This association end is optional
child.label: workRole

child.name: workSpecification
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation shared

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association SpecifiesWorkSpecRoles

This association end is optional
child.label: workSpecification
